title: Herbert Hoover National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Road Work  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Road Work  Construction on park roads and parking lots may cause delays.          Loop Drive Closed August 11  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Loop Drive Closed August 11  The Loop Drive, including the gravesite and picnic shelter parking lots, will be closed for 24 hours for construction on Thursday morning, August 11. The gravesite will still be accessible via the sidewalk from the museum.          Presidential Library & Museum Parking Lot Closed August 12  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Presidential Library & Museum Parking Lot Closed August 12  The Presidential Library & Museum parking lot, including the drop-off and turn-around circle, will be closed for construction on Friday, August 12.
